var cid="0",cid2="0";function readCookie(b){b+="\x3d";for(var d=document.cookie.split(";"),c=0,a;c<d.length;c++){for(a=d[c];" "==a[0];)a=a.substring(1);if(0==a.indexOf(b))return a.substring(b.length)}return null}var user=readCookie("_ga");0<=document.cookie.indexOf("_ga")&&(cid2=user,m=cid2.split("."),cid=m[2]+"."+m[3],dataLayer.push({readCookie:user}),dataLayer.push({event:"Cookie Set"}));
